REUTERS.UNKNOWN: Y f3606 reute u f BC-COASTAL-<CGP>-CRUDE-P 06-18 0053

TEXT.TITLE: COASTAL <CGP> CRUDE POSTING UP 50 CTS/BBL
TEXT.BODY: Coastal Corp <CGP> said it raised the postings of crude oil 50 cts a barrel across the board, effective yesterday, June 17. The new price for West Texas Intermediate is 19.00 dlrs a barrel. For West Texas Sour the new price is 18.10 dlrs a barrel. Reuter
